attributes.action: re-evaluate the classification system for all drugs in light of recent scientific research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent independent scientific research has shown that the current system of drug classification, and therefore the penalties for their misuse, is out dated.

If drug classification was based upon the damage that particular drugs can cause both physically and socially, then alcohol would be reclassified as the equivalent of a Class A drug.

Many drugs that are currently Class A drugs are far less damaging than legalised drugs such as Alcohol and Tobacco.

Let’s revise the system to reflect the facts, rather than basing the drug classification system on outdated and ignorant propaganda.
